sentences.en: A 12 - year - old Ohio boy is in trouble with the law.
sentences.cn: 俄亥俄州的一名12 岁 男孩因触犯法律受到监禁.

sentences.en: And last, Ohio invented chewing gum and the hot dog.
sentences.cn: 最后, 俄亥俄州发明口香糖和热狗.

sentences.en: And the next day, he gave a speech in Ohio about faith.
sentences.cn: 第二天，他还在俄亥俄州做一场关于信仰的演讲。

sentences.en: But that does not apply in Ohio.
sentences.cn: 然而在俄亥俄州的情况并非如此.

sentences.en: By 1810 the districts along the Ohio River provided nearly three - quarters of the country's salt.
sentences.cn: 截至1810年,沿俄亥俄河的地区差不多供应全国所需盐量的 四分之三.

sentences.en: He comes from Ohio or thereabouts.
sentences.cn: 他出身于俄亥俄州或那附近.

sentences.en: His teachers have come here, from Ohio, to tell you what they think of him.
sentences.cn: 他的几位老师也从俄亥俄来到这里陈述他们对他的评价.

sentences.en: His younger brother, Orville , was born four years later in Dayton, Ohio on August 17, 1871.
sentences.cn: 4年后他的弟弟 奥维尔 于1871年8月17日出生于俄亥俄州的代顿.

sentences.en: I've decided to go after that job in Ohio.
sentences.cn: 我决定力争得到俄亥俄州的那份工作.

sentences.en: If both New York and Ohio turn down the Amendment tonight, it will be dead.
sentences.cn: 如果纽约州和俄亥俄州今晚推翻了这条修正案, 那就全完了.

sentences.en: Let's just say there's a well - dressed pack of dogs in Ohio.
sentences.cn: 可以说俄亥俄州的狗穿的很好看.

sentences.en: Nor did I ever travel much beyond the Ohio - lndiana state line.
sentences.cn: 也没再有太多超过俄亥俄 - 印第安那州州界线的旅行.

sentences.en: She had been older than he then in Ohio.
sentences.cn: 当年在俄亥俄州的时候,她就比他大.

sentences.en: That part of Northern Ohio where the Bently farms lay began to emerge from pioneer life.
sentences.cn: 北俄亥俄州本特利农场所在的那一部分,已开始从拓荒生涯中显露起来.
俄亥俄州农畜产品集市场地

sentences.en: The president will cherish the memory of this visit to Ohio.
sentences.cn: 总统将铭记这次俄亥俄之行。

sentences.en: They grew up in Canton, Ohio, and on the day of the Normandy invasion, they were both dropped in.
sentences.cn: 他们一起在俄亥俄州的康顿长大，又在诺曼底登陆的那一天，一起跳了下去。
